update.dynamic:
/* SqlMap-TtTransfer.Update */
CARRY_OUT_COMP_CD = #carryOutCompCd#
CARRY_OUT_WH_CD = #carryOutWhCd#
CARRY_IN_COMP_CD = #carryInCompCd#
CARRY_IN_WH_CD = #carryInWhCd#

COM_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP = SYSDATE

/* SqlMap-TtTransfer.UpdateByCondition */
TR_NO = #domain.trNo#
CARRY_OUT_COMP_CD = #domain.carryOutCompCd#

TR_ISSUER_NM = #domain.trIssuerNm#

TR_ACTV_DT = #domain.trActvDt#
